mapper.insert: insert into recruitmentnotice (title, workType, payType, pay, period, personalHistory, militaryService, detail, manager, miniTitle, dueDate, status, refCompany) values (#{title}, #{workType}, #{payType}, #{pay}, #{period}, #{personalHistory}, #{militaryService}, #{detail}, #{manager}, #{miniTitle}, #{dueDate, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, 'Y', #{refCompany})

insert into recruitmentnoticeboardupfiles (originalFileName, newFileName, thumbFileName, fileType, ext, size, base64Image, status, refrecruitmentnoticeNo) values (#{originalFileName},#{newFileName}, #{thumbFileName}, #{fileType}, #{ext}, #{size}, #{base64Image}, #{status}, #{refrecruitmentnoticeNo})
mapper.select: SELECT applicationNo, method, detail, recruitmentNoticeUid FROM application WHERE recruitmentNoticeUid = #{recruitmentNoticeUid}
SELECT advantageNo, advantageType, recruitmentNoticeUid FROM advantage WHERE recruitmentNoticeUid = #{recruitmentNoticeUid}

SELECT r.*, c.companyName, c.addr AS companyAddr, rg.regionNo, rg.name AS regionName, rg.code, sg.sigunguNo, sg.name AS sigunguName, sg.regionNo, mj.majorcategoryNo AS majorNo, mj.jobName AS majorJobName, sj.subcategoryNo AS subNo, sj.jobName AS subJobName, sj.refMajorcategoryNo FROM recruitmentnotice r LEFT JOIN where_recruit_region rr ON r.uid = rr.refRecNo LEFT JOIN region rg ON rr.refRegion = rg.regionNo LEFT JOIN where_recruit_sigungu rs ON r.uid = rs.refRecNo LEFT JOIN sigungu sg ON rs.refSigungu = sg.sigunguNo LEFT JOIN jobtype_recruit_major rm ON r.uid = rm.refRecNo LEFT JOIN majorcategory mj ON rm.refMajorNo = mj.majorcategoryNo LEFT JOIN jobtype_recruit_sub rsb ON r.uid = rsb.refRecNo LEFT JOIN subcategory sj ON rsb.refSubNo = sj.subcategoryNo LEFT JOIN company c ON c.uid = r.refCompany
r.status = 'Y' AND r.dueDate > now()
AND ( rg.name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchWord}, '%') OR sg.name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchWord}, '%') )
AND ( mj.jobName LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchWord}, '%') OR sj.jobName LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchWord}, '%') )
AND EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM advantage a WHERE a.recruitmentNoticeUid = r.uid AND a.advantageType LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchWord}, '%') )
ORDER BY CASE r.payType WHEN 'HOUR' THEN r.pay * 8 * 22 WHEN 'DATE' THEN r.pay * 22 WHEN 'WEEK' THEN r.pay * 4 WHEN 'MONTH' THEN r.pay WHEN 'YEAR' THEN r.pay / 12 ELSE 0 END DESC
ORDER BY CASE r.payType WHEN 'HOUR' THEN r.pay * 8 * 22 WHEN 'DATE' THEN r.pay * 22 WHEN 'WEEK' THEN r.pay * 4 WHEN 'MONTH' THEN r.pay WHEN 'YEAR' THEN r.pay / 12 ELSE 0 END ASC
ORDER BY r.dueDate ASC
ORDER BY r.uid DESC
LIMIT #{startRowIndex}, #{rowCntPerPage}
select count(*) from recruitmentnotice where status = 'Y' AND dueDate > now()

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM recruitmentnotice r LEFT JOIN where_recruit_region rr ON r.uid = rr.refRecNo LEFT JOIN region rg ON rr.refRegion = rg.regionNo LEFT JOIN where_recruit_sigungu rs ON r.uid = rs.refRecNo LEFT JOIN sigungu sg ON rs.refSigungu = sg.sigunguNo LEFT JOIN jobtype_recruit_major rm ON r.uid = rm.refRecNo LEFT JOIN majorcategory mj ON rm.refMajorNo = mj.majorcategoryNo LEFT JOIN jobtype_recruit_sub rsb ON r.uid = rsb.refRecNo LEFT JOIN subcategory sj ON rsb.refSubNo = sj.subcategoryNo LEFT JOIN advantage a ON a.recruitmentNoticeUid = r.uid
r.status = 'Y' AND r.dueDate > now()
AND ( rg.name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchWord}, '%') OR sg.name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchWord}, '%') )
AND ( mj.jobName LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchWord}, '%') OR sj.jobName LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchWord}, '%') )
AND EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM advantage a WHERE a.recruitmentNoticeUid = r.uid AND a.advantageType LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchWord}, '%') )
AND r.worktype LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchWord}, '%')

SELECT r.*, c.companyName, c.addr AS companyAddr,
rg.regionNo, rg.name AS regionName, rg.code, sg.sigunguNo, sg.name AS sigunguName, sg.regionNo,
mj.majorcategoryNo AS majorNo, mj.jobName AS majorJobName, sj.subcategoryNo AS subNo, sj.jobName AS subJobName, sj.refMajorcategoryNo
FROM recruitmentnotice r LEFT JOIN where_recruit_region rr ON r.uid = rr.refRecNo LEFT JOIN region rg ON rr.refRegion = rg.regionNo
LEFT JOIN where_recruit_sigungu rs ON r.uid = rs.refRecNo LEFT JOIN sigungu sg ON rs.refSigungu = sg.sigunguNo
LEFT JOIN jobtype_recruit_major rm ON r.uid = rm.refRecNo LEFT JOIN majorcategory mj ON rm.refMajorNo = mj.majorcategoryNo
LEFT JOIN jobtype_recruit_sub rsb ON r.uid = rsb.refRecNo LEFT JOIN subcategory sj ON rsb.refSubNo = sj.subcategoryNo
LEFT JOIN company c ON c.uid = r.refCompany
where r.uid = #{uid}
mapper.update: UPDATE recruitmentnotice SET title = #{title}, workType = #{workType}, payType = #{payType}, pay = #{pay}, period = #{period}, personalHistory = #{personalHistory}, militaryService = #{militaryService}, detail = #{detail}, manager = #{manager}, miniTitle = #{miniTitle}, dueDate = #{dueDate, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, refCompany = #{refCompany} WHERE uid = #{uid}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM recruitmentnotice WHERE refCompany = #{companyUid}
SELECT uid, title, regDate FROM recruitmentnotice WHERE uid < #{uid} AND status = 'Y' and duedate > now() ORDER BY uid DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT uid, title, regDate FROM recruitmentnotice WHERE uid > #{uid} AND status = 'Y' and duedate > now() ORDER BY uid ASC LIMIT 1
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM recruitmentnotice WHERE regDate BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}

SELECT rn.*, COUNT(DISTINCT r.registrationNo) AS registrationCount, EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM registration r2 WHERE r2.recruitmentNoticePk = rn.uid AND r2.status = 'WAITING' ) AS hasUnreadApplications, EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM application a WHERE a.recruitmentNoticeUid = rn.uid AND a.method = 'ONLINE' ) AS isApplyViaSite FROM recruitmentnotice rn LEFT JOIN registration r ON rn.uid = r.recruitmentNoticePk WHERE rn.status = 'Y'
AND (rn.title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword}, '%') OR rn.miniTitle LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword}, '%'))
AND rn.manager LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword}, '%')
AND rn.dueDate > NOW()
AND EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM registration r2 WHERE r2.recruitmentNoticePk = rn.uid AND r2.status = 'WAITING' )
AND EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM application a WHERE a.recruitmentNoticeUid = rn.uid AND a.method = 'ONLINE' )
GROUP BY rn.uid
ORDER BY rn.regDate DESC
ORDER BY rn.dueDate ASC
ORDER BY registrationCount DESC
LIMIT #{offset}, 5
